role_reactions.config_start:
ğŸ¯ **Role Reaction Configuration Started**

I'll help you set up role reactions step by step.

**Instructions:**
â€¢ Reply to each prompt with the requested information
â€¢ Type 'stop' at any time to cancel
â€¢ You can configure multiple message/emoji/role combinations
role_reactions.enter_message:
ğŸ“ **Step 1:** Send the message ID where you want to add role reactions.

**How to get message ID:**
1. Enable Developer Mode in Discord settings
2. Right-click on the message
3. Select 'Copy ID'
4. Paste the ID here

**Or type 'stop' to cancel**
role_reactions.timeout: â±ï¸ **Timeout:** Configuration cancelled due to inactivity.
role_reactions.enter_emoji:
ğŸ˜€ **Step 2:** Send the emoji you want to use for the role reaction.

**Examples:**
â€¢ ğŸ® (Unicode emoji)
â€¢ <:custom:123456789> (Custom emoji)

**Or type 'stop' to cancel**
role_reactions.mention_role:
ğŸ­ **Step 3:** Mention the role that should be assigned when users react.

**Examples:**
â€¢ @Gaming
â€¢ @Members
â€¢ Just type the role name

**Or type 'stop' to cancel**
role_reactions.role_not_found:
âŒ **Role not found:** `{role}`

Please check the role name and try again, or mention the role directly.
role_reactions.no_config: âŒ **No configuration found** for this message.
role_reactions.config_complete:
âœ… **Role reaction configuration completed!**

**Summary:**
â€¢ Message configured with role reactions
â€¢ Users can now react to get roles automatically
â€¢ Reactions are monitored and roles will be assigned/removed

command.description: Configure role reactions with simple message interface

main_menu.title: âš¡ Role Reactions Management
main_menu.description: Configure automatic role assignment through message reactions. Use the buttons below to manage your role reactions.

create_new.title: ğŸ“ Create Role Reaction Message
create_new.step1_description:
**Step 1:** Reply to this message with the title and description for your role reaction message.

**Format:**
```
Title: Your Title Here
Description: Your description here
```

**Example:**
```
Title: Get Your Roles!
Description: Click the reactions below to get your roles
```
create_new.step2_description:
**Step 2:** Add reactions one by one using this format:
```
Emoji: ğŸ®
Role: @Gaming
```

Or:
```
Emoji: ğŸ¨
Role: Artist
```

**Type 'done' when finished adding all reactions.**
create_new.format_error: âŒ Please provide a title using the format: `Title: Your Title Here`
create_new.timeout: â±ï¸ Timed out waiting for response.
create_new.role_not_found: âŒ Role '{role}' not found. Please check the role name or mention.
create_new.format_instructions:
âŒ Please use the format:
```
Emoji: ğŸ®
Role: @Gaming
```
create_new.success: âœ… Role reaction message created with {count} reactions!

edit_existing.title: ğŸ“ Existing Role Reaction Messages
edit_existing.description: Select a message to edit its reactions:
edit_existing.message_description:
Message ID: {message_id}
Choose what you'd like to do:
edit_existing.add_reaction_description:
Add a new reaction to this message using this format:
```
Emoji: ğŸ®
Role: @Gaming
```

Reply with the emoji and role information.
edit_existing.remove_reactions: Select the reactions you want to remove:
